net.corda.core.contracts

Class TransactionType.General

  • net.corda.core.contracts.TransactionType
    • net.corda.core.contracts.TransactionType.General
  • Enclosing class:
    TransactionType

    public static class TransactionType.General
extends TransactionType

    A general transaction type where transaction validity is determined by custom contract code

    • Nested Class Summary

      static class  General.Builder
      Just uses the default class TransactionBuilder with no special logic

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Set<net.corda.core.crypto.CompositeKey> getRequiredSigners(LedgerTransaction tx)
      Return the list of public keys that that require signatures for the transaction type. Note: the notary key is checked separately for all transactions and need not be included.
      void verifyTransaction(LedgerTransaction tx)
      Implement type specific transaction validation logic

      • getRequiredSigners

        public java.util.Set<net.corda.core.crypto.CompositeKey> getRequiredSigners(LedgerTransaction tx)

        Return the list of public keys that that require signatures for the transaction type. Note: the notary key is checked separately for all transactions and need not be included.
